channel.title: CI/CD on AdOps Revenue Optimization
channel.description: Recent content in CI/CD on AdOps Revenue Optimization

item.title: Building a Modern CI/CD Pipeline
item.description:
A well-designed CI/CD pipeline is crucial for modern software delivery. Let’s explore the key components:

Pipeline Stages

  1. Code Checkout
  2. Build
  3. Test
  4. Security Scan
  5. Deploy

Best Practices

  • Keep pipelines fast
  • Implement proper testing
  • Use infrastructure as code
  • Maintain security checks

Automation is key to reliable software delivery.
